title: Hyakuren no Haou to Seiyaku no Valkyria - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Male Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Polygamy   Summoned Hero   Transported to Another World   Wars
author: Takayama Seiichi
description: A modern middle school student called Suou Yuuto, ends up in another world called “Yggdrasil”, right in the middle of war. In a world ruled by the survival of the fittest, in which the many clans fight for the hegemony, Yuuto rose up as the “Wolf”clan patriarch with only 16 years old, leading thousands of soldiers using his modern world knowledge as a weapon.>
